body_html:
@alanpurple I just saw some early CUDA 10 stuff, and as crazy as this sounds CUDA 10 is going to be backwards compatible more than CUDA 9.1 and 9.2. My goal is to get on CUDA 10 as soon as it is live and it is passing all of the tests.

If you provide more details I can pass them on to NVIDIA.

If you provide more details I can pass them on to NVIDIA.
body:
@alanpurple   I just saw some early CUDA 10 stuff, and as crazy as this sounds CUDA 10 is going to be backwards compatible more than CUDA 9.1 and 9.2.  My goal is to get on CUDA 10 as soon as it is live and it is passing all of the tests.  

If you provide more details I can pass them on to NVIDIA.
